verbose_text: Therefore, in order to diagnose PCV, specific criteria must be met which include a Hct> 52% in men and JAK2V617F or other functionally similar mutations such as JAK2 exon 12 or 14 mutation in addition to either a BM biopsy showing hypercellularity for age with trilineage growth of prominent erythroid, granulocytic, and megakaryocytic proliferation or serum EPO levels below the reference range for normal 12.
